Text:
Great stuff Bob n Jeff . . . 

Very appreciated, old beans

I did some of my best studying at the U.S. Navy's weather forecasting school at Chanute AFB (closed now and converted to civilian use) listening to this album broadcast from the "pirate" FM radio station at the University of Illinois, Champaign - Urbana during the period April to June 1981.  Damn!  Those were good days!

Thanks for the up!
